steps.description: Run npm run build && npm test
steps.actual: Build succeeded. npm test: 1 test, 1 pass, 0 fail. bun test: 64 pass, 0 fail.

steps.description: Confirm test creates tasks from spec with ## Verification Plan and verifies VP content in verify task instruction
steps.actual: Test 'injects VP content into {verification_plan} placeholder' at subphase-patterns.test.ts:621. Creates specContent with '## Verification Plan' containing '### VP1: Health check' and curl command. Asserts verify task instruction contains VP content and does NOT contain '{verification_plan}' placeholder.

steps.description: Confirm test for fallback case (no VP section in spec)
steps.actual: Two fallback tests: (1) 'uses fallback text when spec has no VP section' at line 643. (2) 'uses fallback text when specContent is not provided' at line 658. Both assert instruction contains 'No verification plan found in spec'.
